title: ‘Road Conditions Are Not Great’: Bumpy Urban Course, Rain Raise Tension Ahead of Olympic Games Time Trial
content:
Flat, sheltered Paris TT route could prompt Wout van Aert to race with a full disc wheelset: 'We will decide Saturday. It mainly depends on the wind.'

Read the full article at ‘Road Conditions Are Not Great’: Bumpy Urban Course, Rain Raise Tension Ahead of Olympic Games Time Trial on Velo.
author: ahood
